trait.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: The scout has advantage on saving throws against poison.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Sight
entries: The scout has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scout makes two melee attacks.

action.name: War Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage.
